About Me

A man is an adult male human. Prior to adulthood, a male human is referred to as a boy (a male child or adolescent).

My interest

  1. Intramural sports leagues — you’re outside, active, and around other single people. Tennis, ping pong, soccer, kickball, softball, basketball, flag football, and more are options.
  2. Landscaping or gardening — getting your hands dirty, working up a sweat, and then grabbing a beer feels good connecting with nature.
  3. Working on cars — whether the one you have or the one you’re restoring an old vehicle, it’s a manly hobby. No matter what, you need to know how to change a tire, use jumper cables, and change the oil in your car.
  4. Anything outdoorsy and active — hiking and camping allow you to be amongst nature, which can be rejuvenating and revitalizing.
  5. Reading and writing — education and building your brain is incredibly masculine. You can also listen to a podcast to consume knowledge. Writing can be pleasurable, a creative outlet, or for a goal.
  6. Riding an ATV — dirt bikes, motorcycles, three or four-wheelers, or golf carts with knobby tires are all masculine fun.
  7. Cooking or grilling — there’s nothing more masculine than grilling a piece of meat.
  8. Exercising or working out — anything active outside is good hobby for the body and soul. Many fitness facilities have a community feel, which is a great way to get active and connect with other amazing people like yourself.

My Favorite

  1. Walk,
  2. swim,
  3. rollerblade,
  4. dance,
  5. hike,
  6. trampoline or just wiggle
